entries.title: Ride Request
entries.description: A request initiated by a rider to book a trip from a pickup location to a destination.
rules: Must include a valid pickup location
Payment method must be on file

entries.title: Driver
entries.description: An independent contractor who uses their personal vehicle to transport riders through the platform.

entries.title: Rider
entries.description: A user who requests and takes rides through the platform.
rules: Must be at pickup location when driver arrives

entries.title: Surge Pricing
entries.description: Dynamic pricing that increases fares during periods of high demand to balance supply and demand.
rules: Activated when demand exceeds available drivers
Multiplier must be displayed before booking
Rider must confirm surge price before trip

entries.title: ETA (Estimated Time of Arrival)
entries.description: The predicted time for a driver to reach the pickup location or destination.
rules: Displayed in minutes when under 60 min

entries.title: Pickup Location
entries.description: The GPS coordinates or address where the driver will meet the rider to begin the trip.
rules: Pin can be adjusted by rider
Driver navigates to this location first

entries.title: Drop-off Location
entries.description: The destination where the rider will be transported to complete the trip.
rules: Can be modified mid-trip with fare adjustment

entries.title: Fare
entries.description: The total cost charged to the rider for a completed trip.
rules: Includes base fare plus distance and time

entries.title: Rating
entries.description: A 1-5 star score that riders and drivers give each other after completing a trip.
rules: Both parties rate after trip ends

entries.title: Cancellation
entries.description: When a rider or driver terminates a ride request before or during pickup.
rules: Fee charged after driver en route

entries.title: Service Area
entries.description: The geographic region where the ride-hailing platform operates and accepts ride requests.

entries.title: Driver Queue
entries.description: The system that manages which drivers receive ride requests based on proximity and availability.

entries.title: Trip
entries.description: A completed journey from pickup to drop-off, including all associated data and transactions.
rules: Ends when rider is dropped off

entries.title: Wait Time
entries.description: The period a driver waits at the pickup location for the rider to arrive at the vehicle.

entries.title: Promo Code
entries.description: A discount code that riders can apply to reduce the fare of their trip.
rules: Some restricted to new users only

entries.title: Vehicle Class
entries.description: Categories of vehicles available on the platform, each with different pricing and features.
rules: Standard, Premium, XL are common tiers

entries.title: In-App Payment
entries.description: Electronic payment processed through the app using stored payment methods.
rules: Cash option available in some markets

entries.title: Driver Earnings
entries.description: The amount paid to the driver for completed trips, minus platform commission.

entries.title: Safety Features
entries.description: In-app tools designed to protect riders and drivers during trips.

entries.title: Matching Algorithm
entries.description: The system that pairs available drivers with incoming ride requests.
